question: There are 169 fifth-graders at Sunny Hill School. 79 of them are girls. On Thursday, 5 fifth-grade girls and 9 fifth-grade boys were absent. How many fifth grade boys were at Sunny Hill School on Thursday?
answer:
Of the 169 fifth graders, 79 are girls, so 169 students - 79 girls = <<169-79=90>>90 boys.
On Thursday there were 90 boys - 9 absent = <<90-9=81>>81 boys.
#### 81
